author: Staff Reporter
text: A case has been registered against Bharanidharan of Nehru Nagar in Kalapatty for allegedly trying to murder his former business partner V. Gopal (50), of Nallasiriyar Nagar in Thottipalayam, close to midnight on Wednesday. It is learnt that the two were jointly running an engineering firm at Kaikonampalayam for five years. About three months ago, the partnership broke and Bharanidharan started a firm on his own.
title: Case registered for attempt to murder
